title: Until You
description: Cameron Burgress was ready for a new start.New city, new job, and maybe one day, a new love. She just didn’t realize how quickly that could all happen until she walked into a tattoo shop, finally ready to get the ink she’d wanted since her fiancé died, nearly four years ago.Ethan O’Neill had everything. Until one day, he didn’t.After an off-ice injury stripped him of his hockey career, he started over in life, pursuing his other passion—tattoos. He’d never been the kind of guy to want to settle down, but that all changed one day, when a knock-out beauty strolled into his shop and into his life.An instant attraction and a little bit of ink is the perfect mix for two people ready for change.
author: Samantha Lind
